Same issue from @fabianpallares in a different form: #16941

I still don't see the problem. I don't see the Handler get frozen. This code does your "***ERRROR***" line and sends a 204, but doesn't freeze:

https://play.golang.org/p/Awlpdc9DOo

I think you'll need to provide a complete demo showing the problem, not just a snippet of code. I see that https://plus.google.com/communities/105964860738231827761 was a recommended Spanish forum in the other bug. Perhaps that community can work with you to create a stand-alone reproduction case and then a new bug can be filed if an actual bug is identified.

I'm going to close this since I don't see how to help.
